summary: Shots at a black music party in the outskirts of Brasilia injure two men that get scarred for life. A third man comes from the future to investigate what happened and to prove that it is all the society's fault.
cast: Marquim do Tropa|Dilmar Durães|Gleide Firmino|Dj Jamaika|Shockito
title: Branco Sai, Preto Fica
